title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Centers        Learn about park activites, join a ranger program, or find the information you need at the Visitor Center. NPS photo   Â      The Visitor Center is housed in the historic 1898 White Pass and Yukon Route Railroad Depot that has been restored by the National Park Service. NPS photo  Visitor Center & Museum Visitor Center is open daily early May - late September Daily: 8 AM - 6 PM  The Museum, located on the ground floor of our administrative building, is open year-round except winter holidays.7:30 AM - 6 PM May - September 8 AM - 5 PM October - April, weekdays only  Both the Visitor Center and Museum are wheelchair accessible and service animals are welcome.
